com.bigdata.bop.solutions

Interface ISolutionSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICheckpointProtocol, ICommitter, ICounterSetAccess, IReadWriteLockManager, ISimpleIndexAccess
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SolutionSetStream

    public interface ISolutionSet
extends ICheckpointProtocol
    Interface for durable solution sets.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson TODO Provide ISolutionSet implementations derived from HTree and BTree.

    I am not sure that we will require this. We can probably use the SolutionSetStream for named solution sets for quite a while without supporting declaration of named solution sets with specific join variables. However, if we do add support for this, then we need to reconcile the HTree version with the hash join code and INamedSolutionSetRef and also add an IAccessPath for HTree and Stream backed solution sets so they can be played out through a simple iterator model. The AccessPath is relation specific, but it could be relayered to provide support for the BTree backed solution sets.

    • Method Detail

      • getStats

        ISolutionSetStats getStats()
        Return the ISolutionSetStats for the saved solution set. This may be used for query planning and should not require the backing solutions to be materialized.
        Returns:
        The ISolutionSetStats.

      • scan

        ICloseableIterator<IBindingSet> scan()
